synopsis.text: The young Noel, raised on tales of his grandfather's heroic exploits as a legendary Seeker, dreams of following in his footsteps. However, when his own abilities manifest, he finds himself classified as a Talker, a support role with no combat prowess, much to his disappointment. Yet, Noel refuses to let this setback deter him. Armed with an indomitable spirit, sharp intellect, and a silver tongue, he embarks on a mission to create the most formidable clan the world has ever seen. By uniting assassins, heroes, and other powerful allies under his banner, Noel aims to redefine what it means to be a Talker. Through cunning strategies and sheer determination, he sets out to carve his own path to greatness, proving that strength comes in many forms. Prepare to witness the rise of the most unexpected hero in this thrilling anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
